amendment.description: Amendment provides for outreach to minority- and women-owned businesses with respect to business opportunities in the commercial space industry.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to facilitate outreach to minority- and women-owned businesses on business opportunities in the commercial space industry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
